response.original_title: Strung Together: The Cigar Box Guitar Revolution
response.overview: From its humble beginnings to its recent resurgence, the cigar box guitar has been proving to people over and over again that itâ€™s not simply a novelty instrument for a select few folk and blues musicians. This film takes a close look at the cigar box guitar movement and how, in many ways, this instrument is redefining the rules of what people think an instrument can and should be.
response.title: Strung Together: The Cigar Box Guitar Revolution
